item.title: Chess Life
item.description: Chess is NOT a metaphor for life Life is a metaphor for Chess. When first starting out, anything less than 10 minute games is merely A Race To See Who Can Make MORE Mistakes FASTER. Stop that Shit! Get Smart, Go Slow. An excellent resource for training openings is https://listudy.org/en For beginners, stick to the basics: Develop Knights and Bishops before Queen and Rooks Play to control the centre Castle to secure the King Connect Rooks The chessboard, just like our lives, is large.
